item.text: If controversy arises between people, they should go to court for judgment. When the judges hear the case, they shall exonerate the innocent but condemn the guilty.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Then</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="07563" class="">guilty person</st> is <st data-num="01121" class="">sentenced to</st> a <st data-num="05221" class="">beating</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08199" class="">judge</st> shall <st data-num="05307" class="">force</st> him <st data-num="05307" class="">to lie down</st> and be <st data-num="05221" class="">beaten</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in</st> his <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st> with the <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of blows his <st data-num="07564" class="">wicked behavior</st> <st data-num="01767" class="">deserves</st>.<n id="3" />
The judge may sentence him to 40 blows, but no more. If he is struck with more than these, you might view your fellow Israelite with contempt.
You must not muzzle your ox when it is treading grain.

If brothers live together and one of them dies without having a son, the dead man’s wife must not remarry someone outside the family. Instead, her late husband’s brother must go to her, marry her, and perform the duty of a brother-in-law.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01060" class="">first son</st><n id="2" /> she <st data-num="03205" class="">bears</st> will <st data-num="06965 05921">continue</st> the <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="04191" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>, thus <st data-num="03808" class="">preventing</st> his <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> from being <st data-num="04229" class="">blotted out</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02654" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="03947" class="">marry</st> his <st data-num="02994" class="">brother’s widow</st>, then <st data-num="02994" class="">she</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="05927" class="">go</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> at the <st data-num="08179" class="">town gate</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “My <st data-num="02993" class="">husband’s brother</st> <st data-num="03985" class="">refuses</st> to <st data-num="06965" class="">preserve</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> in <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>; he is <st data-num="03808 014">unwilling</st> to <st data-num="02992" class="">perform the duty of a brother-in-law</st> to me!”

Then the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st> of his <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> must <st data-num="07121" class="">summon</st> him and <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him. If he <st data-num="05975" class="">persists</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “I <st data-num="03808" class="">don’t</st> <st data-num="02654" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="03947" class="">marry</st> her,”

then his <st data-num="02994" class="">sister-in-law</st> must <st data-num="05066 0413">approach</st> him in <st data-num="05869" class="">view</st> of the <st data-num="02205" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="02502" class="">remove</st> his <st data-num="05275" class="">sandal</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> his <st data-num="07272" class="">foot</st>, and <st data-num="03417" class="">spit</st> in his <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st>.<n id="1" /> She will then <st data-num="06030 0559">respond</st>, “<st data-num="03602" class="">Thus</st> may it be <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to any <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01129" class="">maintain</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">family line</st>!”<n id="2" />
His family name will be referred to in Israel as “the family of the one whose sandal was removed.”
If two men get into a hand-to-hand fight, and the wife of one of them gets involved to help her husband against his attacker, and she reaches out her hand and grabs his private parts,
then you must cut off her hand—do not pity her.
You must not have in your bag different stone weights, a heavy and a light one.

You must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> in your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> <st data-num="0374" class="">different</st> <st data-num="0374" class="">measuring containers</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> and a <st data-num="06996" class="">small</st> one.
You must have an accurate and correct stone weight and an accurate and correct measuring container, so that your life may be extended in the land the Lord your God is about to give you.
For anyone who acts dishonestly in these ways is abhorrent to the Lord your God.
Remember what the Amalekites did to you on your way from Egypt,

<st data-num="0834" class="">how</st> they <st data-num="07136" class="">met</st> you along the <st data-num="01870" class="">way</st> and <st data-num="02179" class="">cut off</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="02826" class="">stragglers</st> in the <st data-num="0310" class="">rear</st> of the march when <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> were <st data-num="05889" class="">exhausted</st> and <st data-num="03023" class="">tired</st>; they were <st data-num="03808 03373">unafraid</st> of <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.<n id="1" />

So when the Lord your God gives you relief from all the enemies who surround you in the land he is giving you as an inheritance, you must wipe out the memory of the Amalekites from under heaven—do not forget!
